      • getDeviceIndexBySwitchTime

        public static java.lang.Integer getDeviceIndexBySwitchTime(java.util.ArrayList<SmartDevice> devices,
                                                           SmartDevice device)
        Gets an index for a SmartDevice according to its workload's time in a sorted SmartDevices list.
        Parameters:
        devices - An ArrayList<SmartDevice> that is contains ordered SmartDevices
        device - A SmartDevice object that has a workload.
        Returns:
        An Integer that represent an index.
        See Also:
        Workload, SmartDevice
